Tantrum backs up, but continues his electric barrage, (can somebody post
for the CF. I shot it with grenades like 50 posts back, and others have
attacked it as well). He then levels his sword and emits a blast of
electricity from it as well, "Sure thing, we'll just improvise with our
trusty can openers" he said, trailing off.


OOC: Well guys that was fun. Gunther your a good player, im glad you
joined, and you and Prowl had some great developements between posts. So
good in fact, that I kind of feel I ruined it with my shauty writing, by
butting in. As much as i would like to play through all hours of the night,
I have a job tomorw after school, so I should get some sleep, good night.
:)
